reasoning: Eosinophilic bronchitis is uncommon inflammatory airway disease, representing subset of chronic cough/bronchitis cases. Estimated incidence 0.5-1.0 per 100k based on clinic-based cohort studies. Limited population-based epidemiology; confidence constrained by sparse literature.
source: Brightling CE et al. (2002). Eosinophilic bronchitis. Am J Respir Crit Care Med. 165(1):4-5
